mentionedBy.name: Blackbaud Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Third-ranked alternative. Cloud-based nonprofit CRM with event management, volunteer tracking, online store, donor communication, one-click reporting, automated receipts. Starts at $99/month with unlimited users.
